attributes.action: hold a referendum on the EU Reform Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We were promised by the government a referendum on the EU Constitution which only failed to occur because of the rejection by French and Dutch voters in their referenda. Parliament's European Scrutiny Committee has stated that the EU Reform Treaty is "substantially equivalent" to the EU Constitution and therefore the people of the UK should now be given the referendum as promised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
